title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB: When performing the 'SaveAs' operation for a java file without specifying the file extension, the file is saved in the specified location without an extension. The Navigator shows the file without any file extension.
EB: When performing the 'SaveAs' operation for a java file without specifying the file extension, the file should be saved in the specified location with the appropriate file extension. The Navigator should display the file with the correct file extension.
SR:
To reproduce:
1) Open an existing java file.
2) Make modifications to the file (e.g., move an existing class).
3) Click on the 'SaveAs' icon, located next to the 'Save' Icon.
4) A dialog window will appear.
5) Browse for a valid container location.
6) Type the filename without including the file extension.
7) Click 'Ok'.
8) Observe that the file has been added to the Navigator in the specified location, but without a file extension.
